content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court resolved a matrimonial property case involving two cars the marriage was dissolved and one car was awarded to the applicant and the other car to the defendant the legal text discusses the concept of shares in matrimonial property the establishment of an asset balance and shareable property the plaintiff is seeking a divorce due to fault on both sides and wants to divide the property acquired during the marriage the court will decide on the division of property based on actual use and market value the defendant agrees with the claims made in the application the court has approved the request to dissolve the marriage and both parties will keep their existing surnames the defendant is required to pay a stamp duty and state costs
